meta.query: #我国成功发射遥感四十六号卫星#

response.share_text: #我国成功发射遥感四十六号卫星#的相关内容，来智搜看看

share_info.display_name: #我国成功发射遥感四十六号卫星#
share_info.tips: #我国成功发射遥感四十六号卫星#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.msg:
嗯，用户提供了一系列关于我国成功发射遥感四十六号卫星的微博搜索结果，要求整理成回答。看起来用户希望获得一个全面、准确且结构化的任务简报。

首先需要从这些零散的微博信息中提取核心事实。注意到多个权威媒体账号（如央视新闻、人民日报）都报道了相同的基本信息：发射时间是11月3日11时47分，地点在文昌航天发射场，使用长征七号改运载火箭，卫星顺利入轨。这些信息高度一致且来自官方渠道，可以作为事实基础。

接下来要梳理技术细节。中国航天报的报道特别有价值，它提到这是长七改火箭今年第4次发射，并详细说明了火箭的两种整流罩配置和一箭双星能力。航天科技集团五院负责卫星研制这个信息也值得收录。

关于任务意义，除了常规的防灾减灾等领域应用外，顶级神延的微博点出了两个关键点：这天恰逢长征五号首飞9周年，且文昌发射场作为深空探索枢纽的地位得到强化。中国日报科技的报道则补充了这是长征系列火箭第605次飞行，这个累计数字能体现中国航天的持续发展。

有意思的是，在文化传播层面，央视新闻使用了华晨宇的《向阳而生》作为配乐，这个细节可以展现航天事件与流行文化的结合。而我们的太空账号发布的发射现场照片则提供了视觉素材。

需要警惕的是结果21提到所谓"004航母开建"的内容，这与遥感卫星毫无关联，明显是标题党行为，应该完全排除。类似地，结果17将卫星发射与新疆暴雪预警并置，也属于无关信息。

对于网友反应，付玉祥把"航天"误写成"航空"的乌龙很有趣，可以体现公众热情；而花家军的传说观察到股市波动则展现了社会影响的多维度。

最后考虑加入拾锤关于中国航天历史的回顾，从东方红一号到如今成就的对比，能提升回答的历史纵深感。这些信息需要整合成逻辑清晰的四个板块：任务概况、技术细节、社会意义和网友反响，每个部分都要标注引用来源但避免学术化表述。


### 一、任务概况
1. **发射时间与地点**
2025年11月3日11时47分，我国在海南文昌航天发射场使用长征七号改运载火箭（CZ-7A），成功将遥感四十六号卫星送入预定轨道，发射任务圆满成功。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 3, 6], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870967492639", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228872050150502", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "听中国", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870999474285", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=nCJExXQQdx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870967492639", "vType": 3}}```

2. **卫星功能与应用领域**
该卫星主要用于**防灾减灾、国土资源勘察、水利气象**等领域，通过高分辨率成像与数据传输能力，为地质灾害预警、生态保护等提供关键数据支撑。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 6, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228872050150502", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870967492639", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国日报科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228892833187074", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=eJ9gKCeF1B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228872050150502", "vType": 3}}```

3. **任务里程碑**
此次是长征系列运载火箭的第**605次飞行**，延续了我国航天发射连续成功的纪录。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [2, 3, 6, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "听中国", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870999474285", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228872050150502", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "顶级神延", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884236701490", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "听中国", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/0022o8y9ly8h8vg74fpp7j60u00u0abf02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=he%2F879RLjO", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870999474285", "vType": 3}}```
### 二、技术细节
1. **火箭性能**
- **长七改火箭**：由航天科技集团一院研制，是我国新一代中型高轨液体运载火箭，具备适配4.2米/3.7米整流罩和一箭双星发射能力。本次任务采用4.2米整流罩基本构型。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [6, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "北京蓝龙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228885454356658", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "中国航天报", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1016.1016.50/008fvaT0ly8h8w3g8nblqj30s80s8js4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=ZPbqrayQdD", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "vType": 3}}```
- **发射能力**：本次是长七改火箭2025年第4次发射，验证了复杂气象条件下的可靠性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [6, 13, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国日报科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228892833187074", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "顶级神延", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884236701490", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "中国日报科技", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/001TtRW8ly8hwnocgfegpj60u00u0jsn02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=CJfPCnzBH2", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228892833187074", "vType": 3}}```

2. **卫星研制**
遥感四十六号卫星由**航天科技集团五院**抓总研制，其部署是对地观测网络的重要补充。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [6, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国航天报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884754956315", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "uuff11", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228880493285182", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
### 三、社会意义与背景
1. **纪念日关联**
发射日恰逢**长征五号首飞9周年**，凸显文昌发射场作为深空探索枢纽的战略地位。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [9, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我们的太空", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228876655231095", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "顶级神延", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884236701490", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "我们的太空", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0077Nzxhly8h8vhm9latkj30go0go75s.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=CMNLfVzt6Z", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228876655231095", "vType": 1}}```

2. **民生与科技赋能**
卫星数据将推动国产遥感技术在防灾减灾、资源管理、智慧地球建设等领域的应用，助力可持续发展。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [13, 19, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "鹰扬博", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228900909060467", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中国日报科技", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228892833187074", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "顶级神延", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228884236701490", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "鹰扬博", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.639.639.50/0084G2VWly8hz6xzt3i88j30hr0hrdgg.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=mv4WLzeE2j", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228900909060467", "vType": 0}}```

3. **文化传播**
央视新闻采用歌手华晨宇的《向阳而生》作为发射成功视频配乐，引发公众情感共鸣。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [1, 11], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "一口摸娱酱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896465193452", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870967492639", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "一口摸娱酱", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/005Xl1oRly8hzvshqv4byj30e80e80t2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=iNinKagjRS", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896465193452", "vType": 0}}```
### 四、网友反响
- **主流媒体**：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "midquoted", "index": "2656274875_1", "data": {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "https://weibo.com/u/2656274875"}}```、```wbCustomBlock{"type": "midquoted", "index": "2803301701_1", "data": {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "https://weibo.com/u/2803301701"}}```等发起话题#为中国航天点赞#，累计阅读量超千万。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "吉林共青团", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228891779894565", "index": 24, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228870967492639", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228872050150502", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "吉林共青团", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1000.1000.50/0030YOrYly8hn5d31dp43j60rs0rs79502.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=X7WByC%2B%2BeL", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228891779894565", "vType": 1}}```
- **公众评论**：多数用户表达民族自豪感（如“中国航天强啊！”），部分关注航天产业对股市的短期影响。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [12, 26, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "花家军的传说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228895473502546", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "魏嘟嘟咖喱喵", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228893692233648", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "AnnyWeico", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896140394939", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "花家军的传说", "img": "https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.216.711.711.50/500d75bejw8exiy1qkunbj20k00zkq8r.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762162769&ssig=isTvLBLs6x", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228895473502546", "vType": 0}}```
- **误区纠正**：个别网友误将“航天”写作“航空”，科普账号已及时澄清。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "付玉祥", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228904727970039", "index": 7, "label": ""}]}}```
魏嘟嘟咖喱喵
吉林共青团
